actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Alabama Space Science Exhibit Commission certain additional real property for use by such commission as a part of the permanent site of the Alabama Space Science Exhibit.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Alabama Space Science Exhibit Commission specified additional real property for use by such Commission as a part of the permanent site of the Alabama Space Science Exhibit.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Alabama Space Science Exhibit Commission certain additional real property for use by such commission as a part of the permanent site of the Alabama Space Science Exhibit.
